title: Racing Search Tree

definitions.expectimax: A decision-making algorithm used in game theory and artificial intelligence for minimizing the maximum possible loss in a game.

summary: The slide discusses the concept of a Racing Search Tree in artificial intelligence, highlighting the problems of repeated states and infinite tree growth. It suggests solutions like using a lookup table for repeated states and depth-limited computation to prevent infinite growth. The slide also includes a visual representation of a Racing Search Tree and a note on the significance of the variable gamma (γ) being less than 1.
